description: This dataset contains information on purchases made through the purchase card programs administered by the state and higher ed institutions. The purchase card information will be updated monthly after the end of the month. For example, July information will be added in August.

metadata.attribution: Office of Management and Enterprise Services
metadata.description: This dataset contains information on purchases made through the purchase card programs administered by the state and higher ed institutions. The purchase card information will be updated monthly after the end of the month. For example, July information will be added in August.

name: Purchase Card (PCard) Fiscal Year 2014
